content: CFS-CID MD PLT Platforms for metal deck firestop sleeves Platform to simplify the placement of post-drill, cast-in firestop sleeves on corrugated metal decks ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Accessories for firestop & fire protection ### FEATURES:Features Platform designed to speed-up installation of cast-in firestop devices in metal deck slabs Quick and simple installation – helps to increase your productivity during the layout Creates a flat surface anywhere in the corrugated deck – simplifying the positioning of cast-in firestop devices Multiple platforms can be placed together Applications Designed to work in composite W3 and W2 floor decks for a wide number of manufacturers For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2298457 - Metal deck. platform CFS-CID MD PLT W2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2298456 - Metal deck. platform CFS-CID MD PLT W3 - Package Size 1 pc
